post.author: Kelly Lee
post.content:
TECHNICAL SYSTEMS SUPPORT PROJECT MANAGER

Careers that know no boundaries.

AOL Canada Inc. is a strategic alliance between America Online, Inc., the world뭩 leader in interactive services and Royal Bank, Canada뭩 premier global financial services group. Working in our dynamic, creative and stimulating environment you will have the opportunity to influence how the Internet impacts on the world. Check out the following opportunity that we have to offer and prepare for a career without limits.


TECHNICAL SYSTEMS SUPPORT PROJECT MANAGER

THE JOB
Candidate will be responsible for providing 3rd and 4th level support to the AOL Canada Member Services organization. Responsible for taking full ownership of major issues and finding solutions. Candidate will work closely with client development and network group and become the primary technical liaison between client development team and member services. Person will track all issues and provide weekly updates to management. Candidate will be responsible for administering several War dialers, NT, UNIX and LINUX box뭩. Provide basic Administration, backup, recovery, installation and maintenance. Candidate will be responsible for all technical issues as they relate to AOL Canada broadband hardware, software, and documentation and client connectivity. Candidate will be responsible for providing advanced training/presentations to member services high-speed team. Candidate will be responsible researching, evaluating, testing and reporting on all technical issues/projects assigned. Provide Technical Support to AOL Canada Management, IMD뭩 & QA뭩. Cross-trained with Network Analyst Position. Provide QA testing to Member Services and Client Development Team.


SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE REQUIRED

?-4 years direct experience in a technical support function.
뷢inimum 2 years project management experience preferably in a web based development environment
뷥C and software support experience required.
뷨trong knowledge of networks and network protocols.
뷙xcellent verbal and written communication skills
뷨trong organizational and time management skills. Ability to establish and evaluate priorities with minimal supervision
뷙xperience in all MS business applications, Windows, MAC, and UNIX a plus. Rational Visual Test a plus.
뷪echnical Writing (Training Materials/ Installation Guides) useful.


REWARDS

AOL Canada has a lively team environment and deploys state of the art technology . We offer a competitive compensation package and excellent benefits, along with an outstanding career opportunity. Apply your skills with a worldwide leader and experience the rewards we have to offer.

Please send your resume with salary history in confidence to Human Resources Department, Recruiter, AOL Canada; e-mail llhawke@aol.com


Additional Information
Position Type: Full Time, Permanent
Ref Code: lh 40  

Contact Information
LLHAWKE@AOL.COM
AOL Canada
55 St. Clair Ave. West
Toronto
post.title: TECHNICAL SYSTEMS SUPPORT PROJECT MANAGER
